message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this item, I believe it would be very valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $200, what do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $100 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. While I can't go as low as $100, I'm willing to come down to $170.  I believe this product will really benefit you, and that's a fair price.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product.
